page.title: 11ASPULL CHURCH SCHOOL (CONT)
page.content: Aspull Church School opened in Noember 1982 but the Official Opening was not until March 5th. 1984. The school was opened by Mr. Robin Leigh-Pemberton, Governor of the Bank of England. His family used to live at Hindley Hall now the site of the Golf Club, and his ancestor Roger Leigh -Pemberton gave money for the building of Aspull C.E. school in 1868. The Bishop of Liverpool The Rt. Rev. David Sheppard and the Chairman of the Bolton and Rochdale Methodist District the Rev. Fred Hoyle were also present at the opening ceremony. Our school consists of four separate buildings which are connected by a covered area known as the Atrium which has a clear roof and lots of plants growing in it.
